title: Teacher Medium Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a person teacher, often depicted with a book or in a classroom setting, conveying knowledge, guidance, and education.  The medium-light skin tone variant is specifically for this skin tone.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the teacher with a medium-light skin tone stands with a confident and approachable posture, typically depicted in professional attire. The rendering on Apple devices showcases a gentle, three-dimensional quality with soft, rounded edges and subtle gradients that highlight the character's features. This emoji conveys a sense of knowledge, guidance, and authority, often used to represent educators, learning, or imparting wisdom in digital conversations.
